abyss.description: The main module for interacting with the abyss engine.

providerType.description: The type of provider to add ('mpq', 'casc', 'filesystem').

providerPath.description: The source path for the provider to use.

returns.description: The button that was created.

image.description: The image to use for the button sprites.

returns.description: The input listener that was created.
The label that was created.

font.description: The font to use for this label.

returns.description: The new map renderer that was created.

zone.description: The zone the map renderer will render.

returns.description: The new node that was created.

path.description: The file path to the palette file.

returns.description: The created sound effect.

fileName.description: The name of the file to load.

createSprite.description: Creates a sprite from the specified image.

returns.description: The created sprite.

image.description: The image to be used for the sprite. Needs to be alive at least as long as the sprite is.

returns.description: The created sprite font.

fontPath.description: The path to the font file.

paletteName.description: The name of the palette to use for the font.

returns.description: The created TTF font.

fontPath.description: The path to the font file.

hinting.description: The hinting to use for the font ('light', 'mono', 'normal', 'none'.

isKeyPressed.description: Determines if a key was pressed.

returns.description: True if the key is pressed, false otherwise.
The created DS1 stamp.

fileName.description: The name of the file to load.

returns.description: The loaded image.

spritePath.description: The path to the sprite file.

paletteName.description: The name of the palette to use for the sprite.

returns.description: The text of the file.

filePath.description: The path of the file to load.

returns.description: A table representing the tbl file loaded.

filePath.description: The path to the tbl file to load.

returns.description: The created zone.
True if the file exists, false otherwise.

fileName.description: The name of the file to check.

returns.description: The value of the specified category and variable.

category.description: The category that the variable is defined under.

value.description: The name of the variable who's value you want to get.

returns.description: The root node.

orthoToWorld.description: Converts orthographic coordinates to world coordinates.

returns.description: The X/Y world coordinates.

fileName.description: The name of the file to play. If blank, background music will stop playing.

videoPath.description: The path to the video file.

callback.description: The callback to call when the video is finished.

playVideoAndAudio.description: Plays video and audio (for videos with separate audio tracks).

videoPath.description: The path to the video file.

audioPath.description: The path to the audio file.

callback.description: The callback to call when the video is finished.

setCursor.description: Sets the cursor sprite and offsets.

sprite.description: The sprite to use for the cursor.

offsetX.description: The X offset of the cursor.

offsetY.description: The Y offset of the cursor.

showSystemCursor.description: Sets the visibility of the system cursor.

show.description: The visibility of the system cursor.

utf16To8.description: Converts UTF16 strings to UTF8 strings.

returns.description: The string in UTF8 format.

worldToOrtho.description: Converts world coordinates to orthographic coordinates.

returns.description: The X/Y ortho coordinates.

scanCodes.description: The scancodes used in keyboard events and functions.

Node.description: Represents a basic node, typically used to group nodes together.

nodeType.description: Returns the type of this node.

returns.description: The type of this node.

removeAllChildren.description: Removes all children owned by this node.

appendChild.description: Appends a child to this node.

childNode.description: The node to append to this node.

removeChild.description: Removes a child from this node.

getChildren.description: Returns the nodes that are children of this node.

returns.description: A table of nodes representing the children of this node.

getPosition.description: Gets the X/Y position of the node, relative to its parent.

returns.description: The X/Y position of the node, relative to its parent.

setPosition.description: Sets the X/Y position of the node, relative to its parent.

onUpdate.description: Sets a callback handler for this node, which is triggered when the node is updated.

callback.description: The handler function that will be called each time this node is updated.

IFont.description: Represents an abstract reference to a font (TTF or Sprite).

TtfFont.description: Represents a reference to a TTF font.

SpriteFont.description: Represents a reference to a sprite font.

getFrameSize.description: Gets the frame size of this image.

returns.description: Gets the Width/Height of this image.

getNumberOfFrames.description: Gets the number of frames in this image.

returns.description: The number of frames in this image.

Button.description: Represents a UI button. Buttons are a type of node

disabled.description: True if the button is disabled, false otherwise.

checked.description: True if the button is checked. false otherwise.

setSegments.description: Sets the number of segments in the image.

setFixedSize.description: Sets the fixed size of the button.

setPressedOffset.description: Sets the X/Y offset of the label when the button is pressed.

x.description: The X offset of the label.

y.description: The Y offset of the label.

setFrameIndex.description: Sets the frame index for the specified frame type.

frameIndex.description: The frame index for this state.

onActivate.description: Sets the callback to be called when the button is activated (clicked).

callback.description: The callback to call when the button is activated.

onPressed.description: Sets the callback to be called when the button is pressed.

callback.description: The callback to call when the button is pressed.

onMouseEnter.description: Sets the callback to be called when the mouse hovers over the button.

callback.description: The callback to call when the mouse hovers over the button.

onMouseLeave.description: Sets the callback to be called when the mouse leaves the button (no longer hovering).

callback.description: The callback to call when the mouse no longer hovers over the button.

Label.description: Represents a label. Labels are a type of node

blendMode.description: The blend mode of the label ('none', 'blend', 'additive', 'modulus', 'multiply').

bold.description: Determines if the font is bold (TTF only).

italic.description: Determines if the font is italic (TTF only).

underline.description: Determines if the font has an underline (TTF only).

strikethrough.description: Determines if the font has a strikethrough (TTF only).

verticalSpacing.description: The number of pixels between each line when the label has multiple lines of text.

setAlignment.description: Sets the horizontal and vertical alignment of the label.

hAlign.description: The horizontal alignment of the label ('start', 'middle', 'end').

vAlign.description: The vertical alignment of the label ('start', 'middle', 'end').

setColorMod.description: Sets the red/green/blue color modulation for the label.

red.description: The red component (0-255) of the color modulation.

green.description: The green component (0-255) of the color modulation.

blue.description: The blue component (0-255) of the color modulation.

Sprite.description: Represents a sprite. Sprites are a type of node.

blendMode.description: The blend mode of this sprite ('none', 'blend', 'additive', 'modulus', 'multiply').

bottomOrigin.description: If true, the sprite's Y position corresponds to the bottom of the image.

playMode.description: Sets the play (an animation) mode of the image ('paused', 'forward', 'backwards').

currentFrameIndex.description: The index of the current frame being shown by the sprite.

setCellSize.description: Sets the size of a single cell in the image.

cellSizeWidth.description: The width of a single cell in the sprite.

cellSizeHeight.description: The height of a single cell in the sprite.

getCellSize.description: Gets the width/height of a single cell in the image

returns.description: The width/height of a single cell in the image.

onMouseButtonDown.description: Sets the callback to handle mouse button down events.

callback.description: The callback to call when the mouse is pressed on the image.

onMouseButtonUp.description: Sets the callback to handle mouse button up events.

callback.description: The callback to call when the mouse is released on the image.

InputListener.description: Represents an Input Listener. All input listeners recieve global input events every time they happen.

onMouseButton.description: Sets the callback to call when a mouse button is pressed

callback.description: The callback to call when a mouse button is pressed.

onMouseMove.description: Sets the callback to call when the mouse has moved.

callback.description: The callback to call when a mouse is moved.

onKey.description: Sets the callback to call when a key has been pressed or released.

callback.description: The callback to call when a key is pressed or released.

volume.description: The volume of the sound effect (0.0 - 1.0).

loop.description: If true, the sound effect will loop continously.

play.description: Plays or resumes the sound effect.

stop.description: Stops the sound effect and resets the playback to the start.

pause.description: Pauses the playback of the sound effect.

isPlaying.description: Returns the playing status of the sound effect.

returns.description: True if the sound effect is currently playing, otherwise False.

isPaused.description: Returns the paused status of the sound effect.

returns.description: True if the sound effect is currently paused, otherwise False.

showOuterBorder.description: Shows a green border around the map if true.

compile.description: Compiles changes to the zone and generates the texture cache for rendering. This must be done after changes to the associated zone.

width.description: The width of the zone (in tiles).

height.description: The height of the zone (in tiles).

resetMap.description: Resets the map, erasing all of the data and pre-loading the base level type files.

levelType.description: The LevelType base for this map/zone.

dt1Mask.description: Binary mask (right to left) representing which DT1s to load from the LevelType

width.description: The width of the map (in tiles).

height.description: The height of the map (in tiles).

stamp.description: Stamps a DS1 onto the zone.

ds1.description: The DS1 to stamp onto the zone.

x.description: The X coordinate of the top-left tile to place place the stamp at.

y.description: The Y coordinate of the top-left tile to place place the stamp at.

getTileInfo.description: Returns information about the tile at the specific location.

returns.description: An array of tile indexes (from bottom to top) for the current tile.

x.description: The X coordinate of the tile who's information you want to get.

y.description: The Y coordinate of the tile who's information you want to get.
